answers.answer: I have to start going twice a week for non stress tests. But I am high risk with high blood pressure & gestational diabetes.
It's normal. You're supposed to have appointments every month, then every 2 weeks when you hit your third trimester, then every week once you're 36 weeks. And this is coming from my doctor.

question: My doctor told me that after 34 weeks...she wants me to start going to the hospital once a week twice a week to monitor my baby's heart beat. I am 35 years old...I will be 30 weeks on Monday and every appt that I've had..has been great. Has anyone else had to do this...and is it routine?
title: is it normal??
